author: pietroGru
body:
#### PR description:

The PR removes the CUDA-related modules and the `customizeStripClustersFromRaw` customizer from the RecoLocalTracker/SiStripClusterizer subpackage. The BuildFile.xml has been updated accordingly.

#### PR validation:
The PR does not require validation, as the modules removed were unused and presumibly not included in any wf.

CC @fwyzard
title: Remove CUDA modules from RecoLocalTracker/SiStripClusterizer
